title: [Large-Scale] Exploring Performing Arts Aesthetics and Educational Value: Learning Design Based on a Systematic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of foundational art appreciation experiences and educational curricula
context.additional_context: Learners can access supplementary materials via smartphones, with an emphasis on real-life integrated project-based activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the educational value of performance art by analyzing its aesthetic elements
Learners can structure emotional responses in performance pieces using systematic appreciation frameworks
Learners can present practical implementation plans by applying aesthetic sensitivity to community-based performance art projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
